Burnaby, BC
V5C3Z3

VIEW MAP

Mon–Fri: 9:00am–5:30pm
Sat & Sun: 9:00am-7:00pm


It’s always better together. We love to play with our friends. We’re lucky to be the little, tag along brother that gets to set up shop inside the snack empire that is Whole Foods.

settings.text:
The Green Cucumber pressed with kale, spinach, parsley, celery, & lime (add apple, ginger or cilantro)

The Deep Green Spinach pressed with kale, chlorophyll, carrot, cucumber, orange, lemon, ginger, parlsey, turmeric, cayenne, black pepper

The Kick Starter Apple pressed with cucumber, ginger, lemon, & cayenne

The Green Light  Apple, orange, lemon, kale, ginger & mint

The Turmeric 2.0 Orange, apple, lemon, carrot, ginger, turmeric & black pepper

The Red Apple, carrot, beet, lemon, parsley & kale

Just Celery 100% cold pressed celery juice

The Wellness Shot  Ginger, lemon, cayenne (add oil of oregano)

The Always Tropical Mango, strawberry, spinach, avocado, spirulina, coconut nectar, vanilla & orange juice

The Almost Chocolate  Banana blended with medjool dates, almond butter, raw cacao, raw maca & almond milk (Add raw hemp seed for extra protein)

The Blueberry Matcha Blueberry blended with matcha tea powder, banana, cacao nibs, cinnamon, medjool dates & almond milk

The Strawberry Coconut Strawberry, banana, cacao nibs, vanilla, coconut nectar, coconut milk & coconut water

The Green Smoothie  Kale blended with spinach, avocado, banana, coconut water, lime, ginger & medjool date

The Mint Chip Mint, cacao, banana, vanilla, spirulina, hemp, medjool date, almond milk

The Coffee Date Coffee beans, banana, cacao nibs, almond butter, medjool date & almond milk. Topped with house made coconut whip.

The Green Protein Kale, spinach, almond butter, moringa, chia seed, hemp seed, spirulina, raw vanilla, cinnamon, banana, avocado, medjool date, and almond milk

The Athlete  ﻿Cacao powder, cacao nibs, peanut butter, hemp, banana, Body Energy Club Clean Vegan Protein, maca, date, almond milk

The Almost PB&J ﻿Blueberries, strawberries, peanut butter, hemp, banana, Body Energy Club Clean Vegan Protein, date, almond milk

The Junior Smoothie Banana, blueberry, strawberry, medjool date & almond milk Optional: add spinach or kale

The Nutter Cacao powder, bananas, almond butter, dates, unsweetened almond milk

The Green Goodness  Apple, banana, Kale, lemon, ginger

The Bestie Bowl  Açai, blueberry & strawberry blended with your choice of almond, oat or coconut milk. Topped with house made granola, strawberries, almond butter, hemp & house made coconut whip

SALADS

The Kale Caesar  Kale salad blend, roasted sriracha chickpeas, smoky tempeh bacon, topped with "cheezy" chia crouton blend, and creamy cashew caesar dressing 

The Rocket Fuel Fresh arugula, roasted chickpeas, diced tomatoes, creamy tofu feta with a citrusy punch of pesto dressing

The Blue Zone Kale, turmeric potatoes, basil roasted chickpeas, red bell peppers, cucumbers, spiced pepitas, tofu 'feta', roasted red pepper dressing


SNACKS

The Almond Butter Cup A smooth blend of coconut oil, maple syrup, and cocoa powder, filled with natural almond butter

Peanut Butter Fudge Peanut butter, maple syrup, coconut oil


PARFAITS


The Yogurt Parfait Layered vegan yogurt, raspberry compote, oatmeal, almond granola
